wblut.hemesh.modifiers
Class HEM_Skew

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Modifier
      wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Skew
All Implemented Interfaces:
HE_Manipulator
public class HEM_Skew
extends HEM_Modifier

Skew a mesh. Determined by a ground plane, a skew direction and a skew factor.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)

Field Summary
private  WB_Plane groundPlane
          Ground plane.
private  boolean posOnly
          Only modify positive side of ground plane.
private  WB_XYZ skewDirection
          Skew direction.
private  double skewFactor
          Skew factor.
